item.description:
The New Hampshire Liberty Alliance is a non-partisan coalition working to increase individual freedom in New Hampshire. They do this by monitoring bills in the legislative sessions and encouraging private charity, a civil society, and citizen involvement.

The NHLA is a not-for-profit organization and completely operated by volunteers.

The NHLA does the work that most of us don't have the time to do, follow NH politics everyday and decipher exactly what it all means. They publish The Gold Standard and The Liberty Rating, tools which can be used to help figure out who and what to support in the New Hampshire State House.

Please come learn more about this group and the amazing work they do.

Many NHLA endorsed incumbents also endorsed Ron Paul!
item.name: Eileen Landis from New Hampshire Liberty Alliance
